alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marinette and northern Oconto Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near McCaslin Mountain Natural Area to 8 miles northeast of Bear Paw Scout Camp to 8 miles northeast of Gillett. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pound around 635 PM CDT. Crivitz and Wausaukee around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pembine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
